review: Good organization as a base on system manegent, salary on time before end of the month, employee Friendly, working culture are on latest system. I am very happy and proud feel .

Title: Accounts & Finance Manager
review: Adani is a reputed group, ejoyed a lot while working here, but there are some constraints which lets people to move out. Such as lot of extra works which is out of JD or terms of employment as mentioned in offer letter. No extra benefits to take over additional responsibilities. Lack of houses in township, lack for parking sheds in township, medical facilities are chargable.

Title: Senior Engineer
review: The company has a big brand associated with it it is very tough to crack the interview as you only get selected if you have reference but overall if you get good position just go to get associated

Title: Senior Engineer
review: Offers good salary Good industry exposure State of Art Head Quarter.. Work culture a bit tough, six days a week working, Long procedures

Title: Senior Engineer
review: Good company to work in india. It is having lot of policies which are very flexible and always an employee centric company looking for opportunities in it.

Title: Deputy Manager
review: The employees working here are facing the most difficult time of their time at Adani. Most of the employees are very insecure about their job, they are not given freedom at work and also at township

Title: Associate Project Manager
review: Stressful and no ethical work culture. Moto is to just earn money. No employee value. No benefits for employees. I didn't found any keen employee for company. Nothing

Title: Associate Project Manager
review: No job security & having no clear anytime you can fired from job.lack of clarity about management vision,HR policy leads to high attrition rate.Employees have the fear to loose job anytime.

Title: Associate Project Manager
review: Not good for working professional.If you want stable career please choose another company as Adani is not safe in terms of job security and advance skill

Title: Associate Project Manager
review: Follow safety in plant Compelsary and PPEand good team work in place all employees friendly treat I worked and maintenance acb, inverter, idt, module, observed crossing , module clean, tilting work. No. Long hours

Title: Associate Project Manager
review: Good company Work not hard Management good Staff skill good Traveling 1 hours is difficult in job Work shift time 8 hours Company work normal no hard. No. Yes

Title: Deputy Manager
review: Compnis of Adani group is Nice place to work and boost your career bt if you are working with as an off roll employee there is less benefits for you. So according to me if You want to work with Adani Group then try to select as an on roll employee. Free transport

Title: Security Guard
review: Very poor progress and employs to given third-party contract..no job safe so contract you work only per year renew your contract no pramosan you can join supervis....and retired supervis...this government responsible to work. No. Life no change

Title: Assistant Manager
review: It's best company in comparison to other Indian and foreign company.best salary offered, good work culture, learning atmosphere.supportive staff.i recommend to join this company. Learn too much, good salary. No cons

Title: Assistant Manager
review: I am pleased to work with adani family. It's a enjoyable time with with owner family members. I am getting all kind of facilities and good manner and respect. Free fooing ang logging. 12 hours duty

Title: Assistant Manager
review: Lots Of projects, Team Management, PRofessional Work Culture Lunch time is the most enjoyable We travel a lot for unlimited project, although allowance available. Sometimes you can't being sociable in family. High Pay scale. Poor Management, higher authority give their responsibilities to junior as well if you show your extra skills.

Title: Equipment Manager
review: I am filling proud to be a part of Adani group. Adani group is fastest growing group in India. Always good opportunity is there for learning new things.

Title: Equipment Manager
review: Nice company to work with. Very good practice of HR admin and Top management. A group in which you can grow and achieve heights. Led by group of best professional. Flights, Tours, Training. Nothing

Title: Equipment Manager
review: The job at Adani is good and tremendous scope is there for managers to grow with competitive advantage. The timing of the office is excellent and salary is the best part. However, be loyal and be global is the advice. Excellent projects. Hierarchy

Title: Equipment Manager
review: My Over all review for Adani Group is excellent , They have good growth opportunities and work culture . The company takes good care of their employees and provide Meals at Cafeteria at subsidized rates. The company also take care of Health and we'll beibg of employees by regularly getting health check done along with In house Yoga Instructor . Brand. Long hours

Title: Equipment Manager
review: good working culture and having good work exposure . worked in different position and location and various varticals. very good org and feel proud working in such org. productive. ok

Title: Equipment Manager
review: Reporting authority not evaluate each and every kra & kpi under department working only according gesture evaluation done and job transfer frequently to far.

Title: Equipment Manager
review: Timely reporting stock statement Due date follow up audit in time period stock taking with auditor debtors controlling SAP implimatattion ledger work and petty cash maintened. free lunch. on due date only

Title: Equipment Manager
review: Starting Days Was Worst Because There Are No Time To Leave Office Its Depends Upon Your Manager Mood After One Month Its Good Because I Know Alsmost Every Rules How To Work. Good Office Environment, Office Design, Office Place. My Manager Is Not Behaving Good With Us

Title: Equipment Manager
review: Its a good place to work, however, a little stressful due to longer working hours. Standards are good, Have a very beautiful well maintained office head quarter in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India. Many good policies, Job security, Great office buidling. Long Hours

Title: Equipment Manager
review: I have more than 15 years experience in construction of thermal power plant and solar plant, specialist in construction of thermal Supercritical and Subcritical boiler and it's auxiliaries and solar plant, solar manufacturing units.

Title: Equipment Manager
review: It's a very nice place to work they have a very e immunity full township they have good facilities for transportation from home to work place they have a very good work culture they have a very good work life balance they appreciate good working people they have lot of trainings to improve yourself the top management or you can say owners are very open you can go and directly meet them they you can say anything whatever you want it so I like to work in this company

Title: Assistant Manager
review: Considering, the current scenario in power business, ADANI is doing best and the policies are crystal clear. The work places are very well hygeinic and work culture is good. Best in Power Sector. Salaries are comparatively less, but looking at other aspects, its Good.

Title: Assistant Manager
review: Fully empowered workplace, supported by leadership, challenging opportunities, work life balance, employee friendly environment and best in class office and tools available, great teamwork

Title: Assistant Manager
review: A nice place to work with like minded people. Had a great exposure in meeting compliance requirement of GST and HST returns. Was associated with litigation team for appeals and assessments.

Title: Assistant Manager
review: Doesnt care anything about its employee. Worst work life balance. Discrimination between a bcom graduate and an engineer after they are recruited at an MBA level in terms of salary.

Title: Mining Engineer
review: Company is excellent and working staff is supportive and good facilities and all things like hospitality and job security is excellent and lots of other benefits here

Title: Mining Engineer
review: It was great experience working with Adani, there were lot of learnings which help me to develop professionally and personally. Overall it was great that i started with FMCG company

Title: Mining Engineer
review: Good company to work if you able to handel pressure. Brand loyality is good, managment is supportive, must capable to handel big business, business size is big.

Title: Hindi Teacher
review: Good company in India for work. Management and working life is very perfectly. Easily understand the problems of employees. Work culture is very enjoyable.

Title: Primary Teacher
review: Hard work...... In the company And management are very good Company is very reputed.but more than 50% work are contractor or contract basis In this company high level sefty are ferferred

Title: Primary Teacher
review: That's good company good work experience is learn at adani power plant Nice engineer to do a work at helping a work. Greet management at adani power limited

Title: Assistant Manager
review: Salary is not as per the work load. Too much hierarchy. Have to work even on weekends. Minimum 12 hrs of work on a daily basis. Increment is not as per industry standards

Title: Assistant Manager
review: Balanced work life with better environment ,Job occurs at various locations in india, career growth is not enough with adani.

Title: Assistant Manager
review: ts good company. Great people hardworking people. nice work culture . Good business projects Good work ethics Good caring people. Good flexible tuning. Good corporate culture

Title: Assistant Manager
review: If you are looking towards learning, unlearning and growing with the organization, Adani is the best for you. The workplace culture is very good with no formal hierarchy in place. You are welcome to engage directly with senior leadership.

Title: Assistant Manager
review: Very big plant and very good job culture. Good spare part management. Good co-worker. Safe and sample work condition. Desalination Water plant is good condition.

Title: Assistant Manager
review: Good company for knowledge gain.for work it is good you can get enough time for family. Location is ok and growing with lip and bounce.overall good experience.

Title: Assistant Manager
review: Good company & management. I learned a lot from this organization. My boss was very amazing personality and hardworking. Whatever I learned from this organization, has implemented in my current work place.

Title: Assistant Manager
review: Point :- Technical skills developed and career growth, financial growth Job a best reforms and good things Skills developed target sauces lifestyle.

Title: Assistant Manager
review: Good environment and good working people to grow with them. Supportive company where you can grow your self in the logistics and terminal industry....

Title: Officer
review: Very nice experience here for independent working in the company. Infrastructure is good. Working condition are fine. canteen facility & transportation to the working site from residence is good.

Title: Officer
review: You can learn & develop your self as the company has got most advanced technology. But due to lot of competition you can hardly grow here. Township is best for your family.

Title: Officer
review: The company is fever of employees and any activity because good place for the work and the work doing well I hope the company all over staff are very interested because the company will be near of me and the company thought for employees and anyone also good for 8hour shift of company thanks for this

Title: Officer
review: Handling of break bulk and bulk cargo Vessel planning  Coordination with Client charter owners and port captain. Day to day operational performance and achivement of productivity norms for vessel.

Title: Officer
review: Yaha salary bohot late dete h or bolte ese hi aayegiagar jar sakte ho kro nhi bhag jao that not respectval pepoul thear company ........................

Title: Officer
review: Very aggressive and stessed work culture. But management cares for their employees and their families. Learning and growth is the one important factor and is compulsory for every one. Mangement gives opportunity for careeer growth to internal talent. Good working culture. Thanks

Title: Officer
review: Good place to work at and has massive footprints in Energy, Resource & Logistics. Decision making is quick at Top most level, however, second line of management is learning the ropes. Employee benevolent fund. Centralized decision making

Title: Officer
review: this is a place where you can learn good things. It is a place which gives you new opportunity. it is good for future. I always feel proud to work here.

Title: Officer
review: stress full work for GT and Mordern Tarde. take meeting for late night till 1AM, unnecessary work load, HR and seniors are not much supporting, timing 9.30Am till manager wants,

Title: Teritory Sales Officer
review: Adani group is fast growing organisation and one of the best employer in Gujarat. I worked in Port Planning, Healthcare and many other Architectural projects going under the company. It was a great experience working with Adani Group. The group is also expanding in many country level verticals.

Title: Teritory Sales Officer
review: Good not working style good. Some extent good and some level warning attached and atmosphere. But overall all health insurance marketplace category for HR.

Title: Teritory Sales Officer
review: Nice company work culture and policies are too much good. I recommend to all kindly try to join this group . Increment and bonous also very good . This is a employee orientation company

Title: Teritory Sales Officer
review: A good working condition and individual development environment. Good guidance by seniors and management for better delivery of assigned work. Over all a satisfactory place to work.

Title: Teritory Sales Officer
review: Every working with something new. Learned much more than in expected in sales field. Management is very very good. very very good culture in working with Adani. Hardest day of the job in target is not achieved in the given specifically.

Title: Teritory Sales Officer
review: This is one of the best company to work with. I will appreciate if I will be able to get a chance to work again. Work culture of the company is very good and nice.

Title: Associate Manager
review: Limited area but experience is good.my work place at Ahmedabad and landscape area is limited.knowledge improvement is not possible and some administration problem. so I leave job.

Title: Associate Manager
review: For amount of work done we don't get enough salary.Management is very toxic and there is lot of favoritism on offer.People who stick here are those who have no higher ambition in life.Top level management don't listen to grievances or pay heed to it.Compromise on Safety and Quality is done on regular basis.

Title: Associate Manager
review: This organisation is an edible product like Oil, pulsed,besan, rice and wheat flour . Product is good and market is good but overall is ok for employee. Company is good policy but managment and other things is not fruitful.

Title: Associate Manager
review: It gives a deep dive into the FMCG industry and acts as a great launchpad to kickstart the career. There are ample profiles available across the company functions which give an opportunity to have hands on experience into multiple domains within the same company.

Title: Associate Manager
review: We have meet the work deadline , lot of regular training provided by the company which generally has develop good work skills. The management was very aggressive in development in business and we have many business verticals so we have different business exposure.

Title: Quality Control and Production Incharge
review: As I am the part of sourcing and procurement team, so do take care for Procurement and servicea. The team and the management are supportive . Also having Good environment for working.

Title: Quality Control and Production Incharge
review: When the company is dealing in the large scale of business though the management is thinking for the each of its employee so i think the company doesn't require any review from its any of the family member, in short it is fantastic place to work.

Title: Quality Control and Production Incharge
review: Great workplace, Management, ceo sir, culture and job security, salary very good. I am very happy to work with adani Wilmar ltd and I am feeling proud with our company.

Title: Deputy General Manager
review: Hectic life. no role clarity. no career growth. very less increment level politics, toxic work culture irregular work flow. flexible working hours. Boss driven.

Title: Deputy General Manager
review: There was no clarity of role for the professionals at the Leadership Positions and thus there used to be very high level of attrition in almost all the functions

Title: Deputy General Manager
review: honestly, it was very useful to work with them and i have learned many things over there in customs clearance logistics part and even new skills SAP above and over all i got a great opportunity there with adani group

Title: Deputy General Manager
review: Its belongs to Adani group. Very big company in Indian market. They have Shipping, port , mining,power. This is billionaire market share company. Very strong supply chain.

Title: Deputy General Manager
review: I am happy to serve here.. It's a international company of oil manufacturing..........................................Very nice place to work.......Free lunch, Breakfast, Tea

Title: Deputy General Manager
review: APSEZL core value is Trust Commitment and employee and social welfare. A infrastructure company and dedicated to nation building and provide a gateway for international business.

Title: Deputy General Manager
review: Good job, mean working condition is good, transfort service is good, salary come in his time to time, worker staff is good. Mean. Almost are good. In working condition no problem with this company. Increment, insentiv are come his time. Company take care of all employees, listening to all Employee Management is good. In this company products is power electricity so, boiler and turbine side work load always available. Risk not. Daily but depending your working style.

Title: Techno Commercial Manager
review: World class technologies and largest supercritical thermal power plant at any single located in India. Management should be more coordinated. Very disciplined and structured.

Title: Techno Commercial Manager
review: But abhi apni career better krna chahata hu because there's no T.A. D.A for offrole employee. So the company does not give expenses like petrol etc. to offrole people

Title: Techno Commercial Manager
review: New Technology i.e. Chinese TechnologyNew Type of Design (Opposite Fire Boiler), Internation Design i.e. B&W Make Boiler, Good Management, Took active part in IBR formalities,

Title: Techno Commercial Manager
review: Nothing to much problem. Problem with night duty.Its to large and lack of training at Adani Power for contractor man power. Also take about his safety and security.

Title: Techno Commercial Manager
review: There's no job security in adani. I am very sorry to say so, i worked in adani since 2008-2017. All of a sudden I was told to look for another job, it was just a shock. My children education was hampered. They had no choice but look out for part time job and complete their education. u must understand that if a man is jobless, it affects the full family, his wife, children, parents. His family life is ruined. Also it creates a bad impact for his new job. I'm very much sad as this has created a bad reputation for me after putting in ten years of service. I would request such organisations not to be harsh with other staff. Today I'm without a job , and I hope and pray such things don't happen with other staff of the organisation. Dear management please look at your staff who have contributed to bring your organisation to this level and then make a decision. Because your one wrong decision can ruin his family life and himself. Thanks.

Title: Deputy Manager
review: It is wonderful company work in adani wilmar every one looking to have a step in it because the brand value and package they are offering to their employees.

Title: Deputy Manager
review: Awl is good production unit but I want to do better job by this company and I want to do something better then it I have worked more palaces but according to my review it is the best.

Title: Senior Techno Commercial Manager
review: Get experience in various civil engineering projects i.e. Port & Harbours, Power Plants, SEZ Infrastructure Developments, Buildings, Roads & Bridges, Railway Infrastructure development etc.

Title: Associate Safety Manager
review: we have to experience to be work in such well planned company. during our intern; we have able to meet all the seniors and it was a great knowledgable experience learn from teh,

Title: Associate Safety Manager
review: I worked for marine & non marine projects. They really take care for employee for the education, growth etc. Marine and non marine works are very enjoyable as far as port is concerned. In a place like Mundra we got all facilities there

Title: Associate Safety Manager
review: learn some thing new in plant management is so good everyone try to help each other share experience to all . the most enjoyable part of job is our team doing give best

Title: Associate Safety Manager
review: Good platform provide by Adani Wilmar group, great place for research working and working as good and healthy. Good exposure for Young and dynamic people so they can implement New ideas and creativity for business growth.

Title: Associate Safety Manager
review: Its a very good place to learn new things Itz a very good place to taught new skills and to improve ones skills All over company is very good This workplace is like home I never felt that m far from home while working
